revised_title: Observations on Ancient Persian Coins and Their Connection to Deities and Cities
tldr: The author examines five ancient Persian coins and their connection to the cities and deities of Palestine, Phaenicia, and the Persian Empire. The coins provide insight into the religious practices and cultural influences of the regions they were minted in, offering valuable information for historians and numismatists.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
